Posts.Content: Hi carolgolf how did you go with your appointment. I much apprecated the details you supplied it was almost a mirror image I have never taken contraception live in health stores and find dealing with the Tamoxifen too much. brain drain. I am like an aged person cannot remember or comprehend anything so I have struggled with it and decided not to continue I also have put on at least 10lbs and drink litres of water because of the thirst. the water I dont mind but the mental fatigue was getting worse It made my professional life impossable I would like to keep incontact with you via Email --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html ----.au by the way the reason for so many different names was I had not logged in properly so I had a few goes hopefully I have done it correctly this time I did say Brain Drain. Hope to hear from you Molly Mary
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen
